name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerlead - Find Any B2B Contact Info

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get unlimited access to B2B contact info of any LinkedIn profile. Top alternative to ZoomInfo, Apollo, Lusha & RocketReach.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find emails and phone numbers for any prospect on LinkedIn. 
Powerlead lets you find B2B contact information at scale.

POWER FEATURES

🚀 Unlimited Credits: Get an unlimited amount of credits for accessing accurate B2B contact info and company data. You can reach as many prospects and candidates as you need. Powerlead is limitless! 

💥 Fast & Accurate: It only takes one click to find verified emails, direct dials, and company data for LinkedIn profiles.

✅ Easy to Use: Add prospects (or candidates) into lists, apply tags and stay organized. 
Use the Powerlead platform to export data to your CRM / marketing automation tools.

👋 Start for FREE: Install the Powerlead Extension on your browser and get full access to all features, including 5 FREE monthly credits (1 credit = 1 B2B contact info with phone numbers & emails).

️⚡️ Exclusive data: Our data sets us apart from alternatives like ZoomInfo, Apollo & Lusha by giving you unlimited access to B2B contacts and decision makers on Linkedin, ensuring unparalleled value.

🔒 Privacy: The extension does not collect information about you unless you decide to opt-in to our community features. Powerlead's data is collected from publicly available sources, affiliates, third parties, and our community.

💘 Our Users: Powerlead is used by top recruiters, headhunters, sales, marketing and business development teams in the US, UK, EU and other countries around the world.

LEARN MORE
Visit our website at https://powerlead.com
